name: The Glass Floor
description:
This game was made for the first itch.io game jam I've participated in, Mini Jam 121.

This game is a short (13 level) puzzle platformer with pixel art graphics. All the assets and code are made by me except for a few lines of code I got from stack overflow. If you want to use any of the sprites or music (for some reason), you can find and fork (copy) the game on replit.com here.

Controls:

  • Up Arrow Key: jump,
  • Left Arrow Key: move left,
  • Right Arrow Key: move right,
  • R: Restart the level (very useful if you get stuck),
  • ESC: Return to the menu,

There are a lot of glitches in this game, I only hope you won't have to see any of them.
